mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID ,B.USER_NAME ,A.CONTENTS ,A.EVAL ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 0 AND IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) <= 0.5 THEN 'active5' WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 0.5 THEN 'star_active' ELSE 'star_inactive' END EVAL1 ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 1 AND IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) <= 1.5 THEN 'active5' WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 1.5 THEN 'star_active' ELSE 'star_inactive' END EVAL2 ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 2 AND IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) <= 2.5 THEN 'active5' WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 2.5 THEN 'star_active' ELSE 'star_inactive' END EVAL3 ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 3 AND IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) <= 3.5 THEN 'active5' WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 3.5 THEN 'star_active' ELSE 'star_inactive' END EVAL4 ,CASE WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 4 AND IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) <= 4.5 THEN 'active5' WHEN IFNULL(A.EVAL, 0) > 4.5 THEN 'star_active' ELSE 'star_inactive' END EVAL5 ,DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE,A.CREATE_DATE), '%Y.%m.%d') CREATE_DATE FROM POSTSCRIPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID WHERE A.COURSE_ID = #{courseId} ORDER BY 5 DESC

SELECT DATA.* FROM ( SELECT D.CATEGORY_NAME ,A.COURSE_ID ,A.COURSE_CODE ,B.COURSE_NAME ,IFNULL(E.EVAL_CNT2,0) EVAL_CNT2 ,IFNULL(E.EVAL_CNT4,0) EVAL_CNT4 ,IFNULL(E.EVAL_CNT6,0) EVAL_CNT6 ,IFNULL(E.EVAL_CNT8,0) EVAL_CNT8 ,IFNULL(E.EVAL_CNT10,0) EVAL_CNT10 ,IFNULL(E.EVAL_AVG,0) EVAL_AVG FROM COURSE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_CODE B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C3.CODE C3_CODE, C2.CODE C2_CODE, C1.CODE C1_CODE, CONCAT(C1.CODE_NAME,' > ',C2.CODE_NAME,' > ',C3.CODE_NAME) CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON C3.PARENT_CODE = C2.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON C2.PARENT_CODE = C1.CODE WHERE C3.DEPTH = 3) D ON B.CODE = D.C3_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT COURSE_ID, SUM(IF(EVAL = '2',1,0)) EVAL_CNT2, SUM(IF(EVAL = '4',1,0)) EVAL_CNT4, SUM(IF(EVAL = '6',1,0)) EVAL_CNT6, SUM(IF(EVAL = '8',1,0)) EVAL_CNT8, SUM(IF(EVAL = '10',1,0)) EVAL_CNT10, AVG(EVAL) EVAL_AVG FROM POSTSCRIPT GROUP BY COURSE_ID ) E ON E.COURSE_ID = A.COURSE_ID WHERE A.COURSE_KIND IN ('NORMAL','COMPANY')
AND D.C1_CODE = #{c1Code} AND D.C2_CODE = #{c2Code} AND D.C3_CODE = #{c3Code} AND B.COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseName},'%') ORDER BY D.CATEGORY_NAME,B.COURSE_NAME,A.CHASU DESC ) DATA LIMIT #{limitStart},#{limitUnit}

SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COURSE A LEFT OUTER JOIN COURSE_CODE B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT C3.CODE C3_CODE, C2.CODE C2_CODE, C1.CODE C1_CODE, CONCAT(C1.CODE_NAME,' > ',C2.CODE_NAME,' > ',C3.CODE_NAME) CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY C3 LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C2 ON C3.PARENT_CODE = C2.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN CATEGORY C1 ON C2.PARENT_CODE = C1.CODE WHERE C3.DEPTH = 3) D ON B.CODE = D.C3_CODE WHERE A.COURSE_KIND IN ('NORMAL','COMPANY')
AND D.C1_CODE = #{c1Code} AND D.C2_CODE = #{c2Code} AND D.C3_CODE = #{c3Code} AND B.COURSE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{courseName},'%')
